name: Aurora Ferretti
title: Art Director, Visual Designer & Illustrator
bio: Art Director and Visual Designer based in Rome. I create visual identities, illustrations, and advertising campaigns that unite strategy and beauty. Currently working at Arkage and teaching UX Fundamentals at Quasar Institute for Advanced Design.
bioShort: Art Director and Visual Designer based in Rome. I create visual identities that unite strategy and beauty.
bioExtended: I'm an Art Director and Visual Designer based in Rome, where I work at the creative agency Arkage on campaigns for international brands like Lufthansa, Oreo, and UPS. My background combines design — graduated from Quasar Institute for Advanced Design — and business, with a Master's in Economics & Management earned with honors (110/110 cum laude). I teach UX Fundamentals at Quasar Institute, driven by the belief that the best design emerges from the intersection of analytical thinking and creative sensitivity.
